content: शपथः [शप्-अथन्] {@--1@} Cursing. {@--2@} A curse, an imprecation, anathema. {@--3@} An oath, swearing, taking or administering an oath, asseveration by oath or ordeal; आमोदो न हि कस्तूर्याः शपथेनानुभ व्यते <ls>Bv. 1. 120</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 109.</ls> {@--4@} Conjuration, binding by oaths; <ls>Māl. 3. 2.</ls>
